resources.string: Automatically pauses media when the volume is muted and will resume automatically when volume is restored within the set time.
Unlock automatically if you input a correct PIN. This is slightly less secure than tapping Enter to confirm.
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Select the apps to protect with biometrics or device credentials
Duration of time after which an unlocked app in background should be locked
Notification content will be hidden and collapsed when app is locked out. Existing notifications as well as new notifications will be redacted. Heads up notifications will be automatically disabled.
Bubbles will be automatically dismissed after timeout
Prevent this application from showing up in launcher. Requires a launcher restart for changes to take effect.
Allow running Android debugging as root

Use the first and second seekbar to configure back swipe sensitivity, the last seekbar to set a dead area on top of the screen where the swipe cannot be triggered, to avoid conflicts with in-app gestures.
Battery light behaviour while on DND, low battery
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Use 60 Hz screen refresh rate to save power when Battery Saver is on
Configure icon and text styles for the statusbar battery indicator
Pure black background for dark theme
Show the brightness slider on the bottom of QS
Show an auto brightness toggle near the brightness slider
Bluetooth will turn off after %1$s if no devices connected
Do not automatically turn off Bluetooth
Reduces eye strain in low light conditions by minimizing screen flicker. May result in reduced image quality and poor color production, or higher power consumption.
dc dimming, anti, flicker, eye, strain
Disable the private DNS when connected to a VPN\nWill restore upon disconnecting
color, color balance, color correction, red, green, blue, LiveDisplay
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to sleep
Double-tap anywhere on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Pulse notifications by a double tap
Swap the \"Back\" and \"Recents\" buttons on the navigation bar
Use a compact layout in the navigation bar
Control visibility of status bar icons

No need, you have already enabled development settings.

When the screen is turned on
Show options for recovery and bootloader in power menu
Enable haptic tick effect on back gesture
Permit hotspot clients to use this device\u2019s VPN connections for upstream connectivity
Enables blur effect in some UI elements
Remove screenshot and screenrecord limits for all apps. This can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks.
Quickly disable heads up for all apps but keep them enabled for dialer and messaging apps
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Automatically lower the refresh rate when the display is idle, to save power. May cause flickering or color shift on certain displays
A higher refresh rate makes the display smoother, but increases power consumption
No certificate specified. Your connection will not be private.

Force apps to ignore notch space
Allow sounds or vibration no more than once every %1$s
Brightness adjustment will only occur at the moment the screen is turned on
Allow to set different volume levels for each app
Replaces the default pattern only\nApp set pattern takes precedence
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Hide the power menu while on a secure lock screen
Allow accessing power menu on secure lockscreen
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock phone
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock tablet
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock device
To wake up your screen and unlock, long press your under-display fingerprint sensor.
Show daily cellular/Wi-Fi data usage in QS footer
Require unlocking to use sensitive QS tiles
Swipe down with three fingers to take a screenshot
When the screen is off, long-pressing power button will enable torch
When the screen is off, long-pressing volume keys will skip music tracks
Optimize your screen based on time of day and ambient conditions to improve readability and reduce eyestrain
Increase brightness and saturation automatically under bright sunlight
Prevent extensive flickering and reduce eye strain in low light conditions. It might degrade color accuracy and affect the way some items are displayed.
Adjust display for lowest power consumption without degradation
Improve color vibrance of flesh tones, scenery, and other images
Deep red for preserving night vision
Warmer colors for less eye strain
Colors accurate to the sRGB color space
Colors accurate to the DCI-P3 color space
Adjust hue, saturation, intensity, and contrast
Warning: This option may not work properly or lead to data loss and is therefore not recommended!
Download satellite assistance data from the internet which can greatly improve the GPS startup performance. For emergency calls, assisted GPS is always allowed.
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Customize charging schedule and limits for your device
Automatically determine when to start charging based on alarms set
Set a target time to full charge
Limit charging to a certain percentage
Charging control activates when you start charging after %s
Battery will be fully charged by %s
Increase touchscreen sensitivity so it can be used while wearing gloves
Allows you to hover the screen like a mouse in web browsers, remote desktops, etc
Automatically switch between 5G and 4G to reduce battery consumption
Show Ambient Display instead of fully waking the screen up
Spoof your device as Pixel XL for the Google Photos app only to provide unlimited storage for backup. App will be spoofed to Pixel 8 Pro if toggle is disabled
Spoof your device as a different model for specific games to unlock higher FPS
Spoof your device as Pixel 8 Pro for Netflix
View current values used to spoof GMS
Disable to allow module usage with custom fingerprint values
Spoof your device as Pixel 6 Pro for Google apps. Keep enabled on non-Pixel devices

Create other pulse and flip vertically
Edge lighting makes your screen glow when you receive a notification. This makes it easier to figure when you get a pulse while the phone is doze mode.
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Show lights for all doze events and not just notifications
Show lights on Always On Display
Hide AOD content when lights are showing
Enable pixel style animation for 3-button navigation bar
Always show passed and total time on media player
Hide the gesture pill and navigation bar padding.
Spoof storage encryption status to encrypted.
Disable to reduce the heat produced by the device while charging or to extend the lifespan of the battery
Stop all non-essential background processes when the device is idle

Make Luminance and Chroma selection affect background colors as well
